text: Mercaston is a hamletMercaston, Derbyshire Dales - area information, map, walks and more Retrieved 2018-03-28. in Derbyshire, England. It is located in the Peak District 7 miles west of Duffield. It is in the civil parish of Hulland Ward. ==References== ==External links== Category:Hamlets in Derbyshire Category:Derbyshire Dales
title: Mercaston
